name: Biker Rage DEMO
description:
Controls:

UP: Change lane up

DOWN: Change lane down

SPACE: Attack

In this demo you control Erwin "Oldman" Müller.

He has been wronged by a punk bike gang and now he seeks vengeance.

Can you catch their leader and destroy him?

Update v2:

-Reduced the resolution.

-Better controls

-Better response on missile explosion

-Reworked boss script to not spawn bikes on the lane that he is currently on.

-reduced the amount of debrees to not confuse the player.
